/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of a bright sun that filters through the trees lining the sidewalk. The buildings, tall and modern, rise on either side of the street, their glass and concrete facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, their colors muted under the bright sky. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human touch to the urban landscape. The perspective of the image is from a high vantage point, looking down on the street, giving a sense of scale and depth to the scene. The predominant colors in the image are blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city alive with color and activity.
